title: HELP! On a massive losing streak (any advice)
body:
Hey everyone, as you can tell by the title I’m on a massive losing streak. I recently finished my placements where I went 2 wins and 8 losses however playing well most games. After my placements I got placed in B5 and have only won 1 game after my placements and loss the rest. Out of all the games i have not “fed” as such. Can anyone give me tips on how to win games more frequently  and climb from B5 (elo hell). Feel free to check my op.gg (you probably don’t want to tbh it’s that full of losses): http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Willik

Tf for reading and hopefully someone can help me by giving advice or queueing with me.

replies.body: Be active on the map. Often low elo jgler are not active and just farm for items instead of ganking.

I'm also on a massive loss streak... 0 - 22 this season

{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}} {{sticker:sg-janna}}
